Tinley_Park.Orland Park 143rd Street station:
Orland Park 143rd Street is a station on Metra's SouthWest Service in Orland Park, Illinois. The station is 23 miles (37 km) away from Union Station, the northern terminus of the line. In Metra's zone-based fare system, 143rd Street is in zone E.
The station faced major reconstruction and reopened on April 27, 2007.
